column4: Im getting a new video card what should i get an ati card or nvidia card?
ATi can run compiz, but with so much efforts
But it sturggles on areas with lots of mountains like alaska and the mountain areas in usa
XD, 7300 should be able to run it fine, but i'm getting a 9300
Hi, did you buy your nvidia card?
if i did i would have to buy a bigger PSU. My computer PSU is only 250 watts
instead i bought 2GBs of ram and FLightgear runs more smooth
yes smoother frame rates dont drop as bad
I have a generic PSU, but it works real good
